verses.verse: Therefore you shall love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> his instructions, <S%H4931><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and his ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> always. <S%H3117><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%> for I don't <S%H1121><s%> speak with your children who have not known, <S%H3045><s%> and who have not seen <S%H7200><s%> the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> his greatness, <S%H1433><s%> his mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and his outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%>

and his signs, <S%H226><s%> and his works, <S%H4639><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and to all his land; <S%H776><s%>

and what he did <S%H6213><s%> to the army <S%H2428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to their horses, <S%H5483><s%> and to their chariots; <S%H7393><s%> how he made the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> to overflow <S%H6687><s%> them <S%H6440><s%> as they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> and how Yahweh has destroyed <S%H6><s%> them to this day; <S%H3117><s%>
and what he did <S%H6213><s%> to you in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> until you came <S%H935><s%> to this place; <S%H4725><s%>

and what he did <S%H6213><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben; <S%H7205><s%> how the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6475><s%> its mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed them up, <S%H1104><s%> and their households, <S%H1004><s%> and their tents, <S%H168><s%> and every living thing <S%H3351><s%> that followed <S%H7272><s%> them, <S%H7130><s%> in the midst of all Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
but your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which he did. <S%H6213><s%>

Therefore you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> all the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you may be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H5674><s%> over to possess it; <S%H3423><s%>

and that you may prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land, <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to them and to their seed, <S%H2233><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

For the land, <S%H776><s%> where you go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H776><s%> isn't as the land of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that you came out <S%H3318><s%> from, <S%H2232><s%> where you sowed your seed, <S%H2233><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> it with your foot, <S%H7272><s%> as a garden <S%H1588><s%> of herbs; <S%H3419><s%>

but the land, <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H5674><s%> over to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H776><s%> is a land of hills <S%H2022><s%> and valleys <S%H1237><s%> which drinks <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of the rain <S%H4306><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%>

a land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> cares for: <S%H1875><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are always <S%H8548><s%> on it, <S%H7225><s%> from the beginning of the year <S%H8141><s%> even to the end <S%H319><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H8085><s%> if you shall listen diligently <S%H8085><s%> to my commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul, <S%H5315><s%>

that I will give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> in its season, <S%H6256><s%> the former rain <S%H3138><s%> and the latter rain, <S%H3138><s%> that you may gather <S%H622><s%> in your grain, <S%H1715><s%> and your new wine, <S%H8492><s%> and your oil. <S%H3323><s%>
I will give <S%H5414><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in your fields <S%H7704><s%> for your livestock, <S%H929><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be full. <S%H7646><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves, <S%H3824><s%> lest your heart be deceived, <S%H6601><s%> and you turn aside, <S%H5493><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worship them; <S%H7812><s%>

and the anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, <S%H6113><s%> and he shut up the sky, <S%H8064><s%> so that there shall be no rain, <S%H4306><s%> and the land <S%H127><s%> shall not yield <S%H5414><s%> its fruit; <S%H2981><s%> and you perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gives you. <S%H5414><s%>

Therefore you shall lay up <S%H7760><s%> these my words <S%H1697><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%> and in your soul; <S%H5315><s%> and you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be for symbols <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

You shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them your children, <S%H1121><s%> talking <S%H1696><s%> of them, <S%H3427><s%> when you sit in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and when you walk <S%H3212><s%> by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and when you lie <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H6965><s%> and when you rise up.
You shall write <S%H3789><s%> them on the door posts <S%H4201><s%> of your house, <S%H1004><s%> and on your gates; <S%H8179><s%>

that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your children, <S%H1121><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them, <S%H3117><s%> as the days of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> above the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For if you shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> all this commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> to do it, <S%H157><s%> to love Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in all his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to cling to him; <S%H1692><s%>

then will Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> all these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and you shall dispossess nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier than yourselves. <S%H6099><s%>

Every place <S%H4725><s%> whereon the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> shall be yours: <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness, and Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> from the river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> even to the hinder <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be your border. <S%H1366><s%>

No man <S%H376><s%> shall be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall lay <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of you and the dread <S%H4172><s%> of you on <S%H6440><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> that you shall tread <S%H1869><s%> on, <S%H1696><s%> as he has spoken to you.
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> and a curse: <S%H7045><s%>

the blessing, <S%H1293><s%> if you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day; <S%H3117><s%>

and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> if you shall not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> but turn aside <S%H5493><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> which you have not known. <S%H3045><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall bring you into <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H5414><s%> that you shall set the blessing <S%H1293><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal. <S%H5858><s%>

Aren't <S%H5676><s%> they beyond the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the oaks <S%H436><s%> of Moreh? <S%H4176><s%>

For you are to pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and you shall possess it, <S%H3427><s%> and dwell therein.
You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>
